description: An implementation of W3C EventTarget interface.
name: event-target-shim

scripts.build:dist: mkdirp dist && browserify lib/event-target.js --standalone event-target-shim > dist/event-target-shim.js
scripts.test: npm-run-all clean lint && karma start karma.conf.js --single-run
scripts.travis: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- test/**/*.js --require scripts/power-assert
